title: Aurelion Sol Size?
body: Im hoping this guy is really huge and not some little baby drake thing. That would kind of be disappointing in my eyes since I don't like it when a species of mythical being is introduced to a game and the first iteration of them is some "ugly duckling" iteration of them. If we are going to get a dragon, I hope he lives up to their MASSIVE personality and lore, otherwise I will be kind of sad. In my honest opinion, if he is a big dragon, he almost NEEDS to be the biggest champion in the game off the bat.
